episodes.title: Michigan AG Nessel investigating 'Twin Flames Universe'
episodes.description:
A company promising "twin flame" romance is being investigated after being featured in a Netflix Documentary. According to Michigan's Attorney General Dana Nessel, police searched two homes in Leelanau County where the Twin Flames Universe group is based. 
The group's website said it helps people find love and offers life coaching. The documentary painted a different picture.

episodes.title: Twin Flames Universe under investigation after Netflix documentary
episodes.description: Twin Flames Universe, a spiritual group in Leelanau County, is under investigation by Michigan Attorney General Dana Nessel following increased national scrutiny and a Netflix documentary titled "Escaping Twin Flames." The group is accused of employing cult-like tactics, prompting search warrants to be executed on its leadership and properties. Nessel has urged the public to provide any information on potential crimes by the group, with the option of anonymity.

episodes.title: Netflix cult documentary features family from Warren
episodes.description: A family from Macomb County said their daughter -- who is famous for her Tik Tok dances -- is under the influence of a cult in California.
